metadata.titleEn: Spatial distribution of multi-year means (2000-2018) and temporal trends (1982-2020) of the start and end of the vegetation growing season (SOS and EOS) across the Tibetan Plateau
metadata.titleCn: 青藏高原植被生长季开始日期、生长季结束日期多年平均（2000-2018）及变化趋势（1982-2020）的空间格局
metadata.description: This datasets include the spatial distribution multi-year means of the SOS and EOS from 2000 to 2018, and the temporal trends of the SOS and EOS from 1982 to 1999 and 2000 to 2020 across the Tibetan Plateau. Based on AVHRR NDVI, MODIS NDVI, and EVI, four steps were used to minimize bias and noise in SOS and EOS extracted from time series of vegetation indexes. First, pixels with multiple-year average vegetation indexes lower than a threshold are regarded as areas of low or no vegetation coverage and are excluded. The pixels with weak seasonality of greenness are also excluded. Second, values of vegetation indexes contaminated by snow cover, ice, or both in winter (December–early March) are substituted with the mean of non-contaminated, high-quality vegetation indexes values during winter. Third, remaining negative vegetation indexes bias caused by clouds and aerosols in other seasons is calibrated by a Savitzky–Golay filtering technique. Finally the improved annual time series of vegetation indexes is fitted to double logistic or modified double logistic functions. Based on thresholds and inflection-point, the SOS and EOS across the Tibetan Plateau were extracted. The spatial resolution of the datasets were 250m and 1/12°. The data quality is reliable.
metadata.descriptionCn: 本数据集包括2000-2018年青藏高原植被生长季开始日期、结束日期多年平均空间分布格局，1982-1999年和2000-2020年青藏高原植被生长季开始日期、结束日期的时间变化趋势。该数据集以AVHRR NDVI、MODIS NDVI、EVI为基础，通过四个步骤最小化植被指数时间序列的偏差和噪声。首先，去除无植被覆盖、低植被覆盖或季节性较弱的植被对应的像元；其次，将冬季（12月至3月初）受积雪、冰或两者污染的植被指数替换为冬季未受污染的高质量的植被指数的平均值；其他季节由云和气溶胶引起的植被指数负偏差通过Savitzky-Golay方法进行校准；最后，使用双逻辑斯蒂或改良后的双逻辑斯蒂函数拟合年植被指数时间序列。基于阈值和拐点的方法，逐像元提取青藏高原植被生长季开始日期、结束日期。数据的空间分辨率为250m和1/12°。数据质量可靠。

Feature Specification.QuestionEn: What are the characteristics of data collection methods for determining the start and end dates of vegetation growth seasons on the Qinghai-Tibet Plateau?
Feature Specification.QuestionCn: 确定青藏高原植被生长季节开始和结束日期的数据收集方法的特点是什么？
Feature Specification.AnswerEn: AVHRR NDVI, MODIS NDVI, EVI datasets, minimizing bias and noise, removing pixels with no vegetation cover, low vegetation cover, or weak seasonality, replacing winter vegetation indices affected by snow or ice, correcting negative deviations using the Savitzky-Golay method, fitting annual vegetation index time series using a dual logistic or modified dual logistic function, threshold and inflection point method, spatial resolution of 250m and 1/12°.
Feature Specification.AnswerCn: AVHRR NDVI、MODIS NDVI、EVI 数据集，最小化偏差和噪声，去除无植被覆盖、低植被覆盖或季节性弱的像素，替换受雪或冰影响的冬季植被指数，使用 Savitzky-Golay 方法校正负偏差，使用双逻辑或修改后的双逻辑函数拟合年度植被指数时间序列，阈值和拐点方法，空间分辨率为 250m 和 1/12°。

Comparison.QuestionEn: How do the data collection methods based on AVHRR NDVI and MODIS NDVI compare in terms of their ability to minimize bias and noise in vegetation index time series?
Comparison.QuestionCn: 基于AVHRR NDVI和MODIS NDVI的数据收集方法在减少植被指数时间序列中的偏差和噪声方面的比较如何？
Comparison.AnswerEn: Both AVHRR NDVI and MODIS NDVI data collection methods involve a series of steps to minimize bias and noise. The process includes removing pixels with no or low vegetation cover, replacing winter vegetation index values affected by snow or ice with high-quality averages, calibrating negative biases caused by clouds and aerosols using the Savitzky-Golay method, and fitting annual vegetation index time series with double logistic or modified double logistic functions. These methods aim to provide reliable spatial and temporal patterns of vegetation growth season dates.
Comparison.AnswerCn: AVHRR NDVI 和 MODIS NDVI 数据收集方法涉及一系列步骤，以最小化偏差和噪声。该过程包括去除没有或低植被覆盖的像素，用高质量的平均值替换受雪或冰影响的冬季植被指数值，使用 Savitzky-Golay 方法校正因云和气溶胶引起的负偏差，以及用双逻辑或改进双逻辑函数拟合年度植被指数时间序列。这些方法旨在提供可靠的植被生长季节日期的空间和时间模式。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What factors contribute to spatial and temporal variations in vegetation growth season dates on the Tibetan Plateau?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 影响青藏高原植被生长季节日期的空间和时间变化的因素有哪些？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: The factors contributing to spatial and temporal variations in vegetation growth season dates on the Tibetan Plateau include the methods used to minimize deviations and noise in vegetation index time series, such as eliminating pixels with low vegetation coverage or weak seasonality, replacing indices affected by snow and ice with high-quality winter indices, and calibrating negative deviations caused by clouds and aerosols. Additionally, the fitting of annual vegetation index time series using double logistic or modified double logistic functions plays a role, as well as the threshold and inflection point methods used for extracting growth season dates.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 影响青藏 Plateau 植被生长季节日期的空间和时间变化的因素包括用于最小化植被指数时间序列中的偏差和噪声的方法，例如消除植被覆盖率低或季节性弱的像素，用高质量的冬季指数替换受雪和冰影响的指数，以及校正因云和气溶胶造成的负偏差。此外，使用双逻辑或改进双逻辑函数拟合年度植被指数时间序列也起着重要作用，以及用于提取生长季节日期的阈值和拐点方法。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What steps are involved in minimizing bias and noise in vegetation index time series data for extracting the start and end dates of the growing season on the Tibetan Plateau?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 在提取青藏高原生长季节的开始和结束日期时，减少植被指数时间序列数据中的偏差和噪声涉及哪些步骤？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: To minimize bias and noise in the vegetation index time series data, the following steps are involved: First, remove pixels corresponding to areas with no vegetation cover, low vegetation cover, or weak seasonal vegetation. Second, replace vegetation indices affected by snow, ice, or both during the winter months (December to early March) with the average of high-quality, uncontaminated winter vegetation indices. Third, correct negative deviations in vegetation indices caused by clouds and aerosols in other seasons using the Savitzky-Golay method. Finally, fit the annual vegetation index time series using a double logistic or modified double logistic function. The start and end dates of the growing season are extracted pixel by pixel using the method of thresholds and inflection points.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 为了最小化植被指数时间序列数据中的偏差和噪声，涉及以下步骤：首先，去除对应于无植被覆盖、低植被覆盖或季节性植被较弱区域的像素。其次，在冬季（12月至3月初）期间，用高质量、未受污染的冬季植被指数的平均值替换受雪、冰或两者影响的植被指数。第三，使用Savitzky-Golay方法纠正其他季节中由于云和气溶胶造成的植被指数的负偏差。最后，使用双逻辑或改进的双逻辑函数拟合年度植被指数时间序列。通过阈值和拐点的方法逐像素提取生长季节的开始和结束日期。
